pages.text: Golden collars might not look much different from normal collars, but they provide 9 Armor and 2 Armor Toughness for your dog!$(br2)To put one on a dog, simply interact with them with the collar in hand. To remove a collar, you'll need a pair of shears and to interact with the dog with the shears in hand.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Any color of collar may be used.
In addition to being crafted in any color by using a regular collar of the desired color, any gold-plated collar may be dyed to another color with another dye!
pages.title: Dying
